en.about_purpose_text:
PDFRecon identifies potentially manipulated PDF files by:
‚Ä¢ Extracting and analyzing XMP metadata, streams, and revisions
‚Ä¢ Detecting signs of alteration (e.g., /TouchUp_TextEdit, /Prev)
‚Ä¢ Extracting complete, previous versions of the document
‚Ä¢ Generating a clear report in Excel format
en.about_included_software_text:
This tool utilizes and includes {tool} by Phil Harvey.
{tool} is distributed under the Artistic/GPL license.
